name: Project Mecha Fighter (Early Demo)
description:
2D Airdasher with an emphasis on movement.

This is more of a declaration of intent at the moment, but you can start looking around at the training mode and early art. :)

Controls : Button Name
ControllerKeyboardDirectionsDPad or Stick
WASD or arrow keys
JumpUpW, Up, or Spacebar
A - Light Attack
X / Square
H or Keypad 4
B - Medium Attack
Y / Triangle
J or Keypad 5C - Heavy Attack / Back
B / Circle
K or Keypad 6D - Boost / Confirm
A / Cross
L or Keypad 0
